summary: VEHICLES STALLING WHILE DRIVING, MOSTLY WHILE DECELERATING.  SEEMS TO OCCUR MORE FREQUENTLY WITH A FULL FUEL TANK AND WHILE PULLING A TRAILER, BUT HAS ALSO OCCURRED WITH A HALF A TANK.  NO PROBLEM RESTARTING AFTER STALL.  STARTED OCCURRING MORE FREQUENTLY IN JUNE OF 2013.  HAS HAPPENED AT LEAST 6 TIMES IN THE PAST 18 MONTHS.  *TR
